content: provides harness brackets for the bottom tailgate and fiber bundle organizer hardware.  FC 7816 is for top exit cabling and power, a bottom seal plate is installed.  FC 5827 provides the MPO mounting brackets that cable harnesses connect to in the top and or bottom exit tailgates. A view of the top rear of the frame and the openings for top exit cables and power is shown in Figure 2-4. When FC 7898 is installed, the plated adjustable shields are removed, and the top exit enclosure is installed. 2 MPO - Multi-fiber Push On connector Note: Overhead I/O cabling is contained within the frames. Extension “chimneys” that were featured with systems before IBM z15 systems are no longer used. Chapter 2.
